  • monitoringFailure :: state -> Action state a -> LookUp -> Error state m -> Property -> Property

data DynLogic s

  • | AfterAny (DynPred s)
  • | Alt ChoiceType (DynLogic s) (DynLogic s)
  • | Stopping (DynLogic s)

  • | Error String (DynPred s)
  • | Weight Double (DynLogic s)
  • | forall a.QuantifyConstraints a => ForAll (Quantification a) (a -> DynLogic s)
  • | Monitor (Property -> Property) (DynLogic s)
name: DynLogic Monitor ForAll Weight After Stopping AfterAny Stop EmptySpec Error Alt
